content.rendered:
Pet Grooming

From haircuts to teeth cleaning, Lucky Paws is your one-stop shop for all your pet grooming needs.

Dog Grooming

Fulfilling your needs as a pet parent is our number one priority. Each grooming experience is individualized and delivered with kindness and exceptional care. We work hard to ensure the safety and quality you deserve and will gladly answer any questions you have to ensure that you feel confident in giving us the opportunity to groom your loved ones. 

Full Groom

The Full Groom includes the Bubble Bath, PLUS the Mini Groom, AND a full body haircut . We will remove tangles and mats, give a soothing bath, and make your dog look like a superstar.

Mini Groom

The Mini Groom is a Bubble Bath PLUS trimming of the hygiene areas, pad hair and feet and face. The Mini Groom is an In-Between groom for when your dog does not require a full body haircut

Bubble Bath

The Bubble Bath will give your dog that groomed look, without the haircut. Choose the Bubble Bath and your dog will get a soothing bath, nail trim, ear cleaning, foot pad trim and brush out.

Additional Services

Spa Package

Includes Fresh Facial Treatment, Paw Treatment, Full Body Oatmeal/Cucumber Spa Shampoo, and Spa Fragrance. All Treatments soak for 10 minutes for full effect.

Nail Filing

In addition to the nail trimming you may want to have your dogs nails filed. This allows us to get the nails shorter and your dogs nails will be more gentle on your skin.

Nail, Pad and Feet Trim

In addition to the nail trimming you may want to have your dogs pad hair and feet trimmed. No appointment necessary.

Nail, Pad and Feet Trim

In addition to the nail trimming you may want to have your dogs pad hair and feet trimmed. No appointment necessary.

Nail Trimming

Included with every bath and groom or walk in any time for just a nail trim no appointment necessary.

Anal Glands Expressed

Some dogs may need this service to give relief if they are scooting or licking.

Teeth Brushing

Gentle but effective brushing, removes any debris causing bad breath. Helps keep plaque from forming. We use an anti-bacterial gel that leaves breath minty fresh.

Request an Appointment

Request Appointment

Cat Grooming

Super Pets Grooming is now offering cat grooming services at select locations. Contact us to schedule your grooming appointment.
Learn More
Grooming

Let our groomers give your cat a trim that will leave him looking fresh and sharp.

Bath

Our cat bathing services will leave your cat so fresh he will be purring for days.

Nail Trim

Long cat nails? No problem, we will trim your cats nails and spare you from those accidental scratches.
